languages.text: "Первый офицер Версериан... на дух не выношу. Офицеришка флотский, ни хрена в нашем деле не смыслит, а все туда же, командовать норовит. Сцепились пару раз с ним, тогда отстал. Слава Императору, Леди Теодора в кормчих вопросах все же мне верила, а не сенешалю!"

"First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"
languages.original_text: "Первый офицер Версериан... на дух не выношу. Офицеришка флотский, ни хрена в нашем деле не смыслит, а все туда же, командовать норовит. Сцепились пару раз с ним, тогда отстал. Слава Императору, Леди Теодора в кормчих вопросах все же мне верила, а не сенешалю!"

traits.locale_text: "First Officer Werserian... I cannot stand him. Like every Navy officer I met, he doesn't know a thing about our craft but puffs himself up and tries to order people around. We had a few clashes before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal in matters of helmsmanship!"

"First Officer Werserian... I cannot stand him. Like every Navy officer I met, he doesn't know a thing about our craft but puffs himself up and tries to order people around. We had a few clashes before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal in matters of helmsmanship!"

"First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I met, he doesn't know a thing about our craft but puffs himself up and tries to order people around. We had a few clashes before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal in matters of helmsmanship!"

"First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I met, he doesn't know a thing about our craft but puffs himself up and tries to order people around. We had a few clashes before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal in matters of helmsmanship!"

"First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

"First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

languages.text: “韦尔森大副……我真的受不了这个人。我见过的每个海军军官，都是他这副臭德行。他根本不知道怎么开船，可他总是走到哪吹到哪，到处宣扬自己有多厉害。我不得不和他谈了好几次，他才不再对我的工作指手画脚。感谢帝皇，幸好在开船这方面，西奥多拉女士更信任我，而不是那个总领。”
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森大副……我真的受不了这个人。我见过的每个海军军官，都是他这副臭德行。他根本不知道怎么开船，可他总是走到哪吹到哪，到处宣扬自己有多厉害。我不得不和他谈了好几次，他才不再对我的工作指手画脚。感谢帝皇，幸好在开船这方面，西奥多拉女士更信任我，而不是那个总领。”

languages.text: «El primer oficial Werserian... es insoportable. Es como cualquier otro oficial de la Armada al que he conocido: no tiene ni idea de cómo se controla una nave del vacío, pero sigue dándose aires y mangoneando a la gente. Tuvimos unas cuantas discusiones hasta que me dejó en paz. ¡Gracias al Emperador que lady Theodora confió en mí y no en el Senescal a la hora de manejar una nave del vacío!».
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

traits.locale_text: «El primer oficial Werserian... es insoportable. Es como cualquier otro oficial de la Armada al que he conocido: no tiene ni idea de cómo se controla una nave del vacío, pero sigue dándose aires y mangoneando a la gente. Tuvimos unas cuantas discusiones hasta que me dejó en paz. ¡Gracias al Emperador que lady Theodora confió en mí y no en el Senescal a la hora de manejar una nave del vacío!».

languages.text: 「ファーストオフィサー・ワーセリアン…彼には我慢なりません。これまで会ってきたあらゆる海軍士官と同じく、虚空における船の操作について何も知らないくせに、偉そうに。私にまかせてくれるまでに、何度も議論せねばなりませんでした。船の操縦に関しては、シオドーラ様が家令長よりも私を信頼してくださったことに感謝せねばなりませんね！」
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

traits.locale_text: 「ファーストオフィサー・ワーセリアン…彼には我慢なりません。これまで会ってきたあらゆる海軍士官と同じく、虚空における船の操作について何も知らないくせに、むやみに偉そうに。私にまかせてくれるまでに、いくらか言葉を交わさねばなりませんでした。船の操縦に関しては、テオドラ様が家令長よりも私を信頼してくださったことに感謝せねばなりませんね！」

languages.text: "Erster Offizier Werserian ... Ich kann ihn nicht leiden. Wie alle Marineoffiziere, die ich kenne, hat er keine Ahnung, wie man ein Schiff durch die Leere lenkt, trotzdem plustert er sich ständig auf und macht sich wichtig. Wir mussten ein paar Mal streiten, bis er mich in Ruhe ließ. Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass mir Lady Theodora hinsichtlich der Steuerung eines Raumschiffs mehr Vertrauen geschenkt hat als der Truchsess."
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

traits.locale_text: "Erster Offizier Werserian ... Ich kann ihn nicht leiden. Wie alle Marineoffiziere, die ich kenne, hat er keine Ahnung, wie man ein Schiff durch die Leere lenkt, trotzdem plustert er sich ständig auf und macht sich wichtig. Wir mussten ein paar Mal streiten, bis er mich in Ruhe ließ. Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass mir Lady Theodora hinsichtlich der Steuerung eines Raumschiffs mehr Vertrauen geschenkt hat als der Truchsess."

languages.text: « Le second Werserian... Il me sort par les yeux. Comme tous les officiers de la Marine que j'ai rencontrés, il ne connaît absolument rien à l'art de manœuvrer un vaisseau dans le vide, mais cela ne l'empêche pas de donner son avis sur tout et de jouer les importants. Lui et moi, on a eu des mots par le passé, jusqu'à ce qu'il me fiche enfin la paix. Loué soit l'Empereur, dame Théodora me faisait davantage confiance qu'au sénéchal pour piloter un vaisseau spatial ! »
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"

traits.locale_text: « Le second Werserian... Il me sort par les yeux. Comme tous les officiers de la Marine que j'ai rencontrés, il ne connaît absolument rien à l'art de manœuvrer un vaisseau dans le vide, mais cela ne l'empêche pas de donner son avis sur tout et de jouer les importants. Lui et moi, on a eu des mots par le passé, jusqu'à ce qu'il me fiche enfin la paix. Loué soit l'Empereur, dame Théodora me faisait davantage confiance qu'au sénéchal pour piloter un vaisseau spatial ! »

languages.text: "İkinci Kaptan Werserian. O herife katlanamıyorum. Tanıdığım tüm Donanma subayları gibi uçsuzda gemi iradesi hakkında bir halt bildiği yok ama kasıla kasıla gezmesi, dayılanması yok mu? Neyse ki bir iki ağız dalaşından sonra bana ilişmemeye başladı. İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki Leydi Theodora, uçsuz gemilerinde dümen tutma konusunda bana Seneşal'dan daha çok güveniyordu!"
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian... I can't stand him. Like every Navy officer I ever met, he doesn't know a thing about controlling a vessel in the void, but he puffs himself up all the same and throws his weight around. Me and him had to have words a few times before he left me alone. Thank the Emperor Lady Theodora trusted me more than the Seneschal when it came to helming a voidship!"
